description:
The compound interest calculator lets you see how your money can grow using interest compounding.

Set the amount, rate, compund (Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Quarterly,Half Yearly, Yearly) and time. 

Then you will get the total amount.

Lightweight plugin as all functions are custom made, no libraries to fetch.

NEED HELP BUILDING A CUSTOM APPLICATION?
https://dev.zeroqode.com

SUPERCHARGE YOUR APP WITH ZEROQODE PLUGINS
https://zeroqode.com/plugins

QUESTIONS OR NEED HELP?
https://forum.zeroqode.com
name: Loan Calculator
plugin_instructions:
1 - Download the plugin
2 - Use the Compound Calculator in actions
3 - Set the values for its inputs, set states for result
4 - get the states on the text on the front end
